text: Roy Young (1937 â€“ 27 April 2018) was a English rock and roll singer, pianist and keyboard player. He first recorded in the late 1950s before performing in Hamburg with The Beatles. He also played for Cliff Bennett and the Rebel Rousers. He released several albums with his own band as well as recording with Chuck Berry and David Bowie, among others. ==References== ==Other websites== * Roy Young at Discogs.com Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:English rock singers Category:English pianists Category:Singers from London Category:Musicians from London
title: Roy Young (musician)
